item.title: Save the Date Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to create a save the date video for our wedding next year. We are a fun and outgoing couple, and we want a video that reflects our personalities. We are open to different creative ideas, but we would like the video to be no more than 2.5 minutes long.

**Requirements:**
* Experience in creating save the date videos
* The ability to work with a tight deadline
* A portfolio of your work

**To Apply:**
Please submit your portfolio and a proposal to this job posting. We will be reviewing applications on a rolling basis and will contact the finalists for an interview.

**Example Videos:**

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CQG8bRDr5X0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0CoIkQHqbis
https://youtu.be/ullm3ob4Ghs?si=_oyG0ONAGDZzXvJH
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8wADVFLQ9nc

We hope to find a videographer who can create a beautiful and memorable save the date video for our wedding.

Thank you for your time and consideration.


Budget: $35
Posted On: June 29, 2024 16:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create a 30-second Brand Transition Video for Gyrus Systems. - Upwork
item.description:
We are Gyrus Systems, a leader in learning management solutions since 1987. We specialize in compliance training for highly regulated industries and are undergoing an exciting rebranding journey. We need a talented video creator to produce a 30-second promotional video that captures our new mission, vision, and visual identity.

Project Overview:

The video should:

Highlight our history since 1987 and our specialization in compliance training.
Showcase the transition from our old logo to our new logo.
Communicate our new mission: ensuring society’s most critical organizations have a prepared workforce.
Highlight our vision: revolutionizing learning with cutting-edge technology and personalized support.
Include dynamic and engaging visuals of our technology platform and team.
Be professionally edited with voiceover, text overlays, and background music.
Responsibilities:

Create a storyboard based on the provided script and brand guidelines.
Source or create necessary visuals, including transitions and animations.
Record or source professional voiceover.
Edit the video to include text overlays and background music.
Deliver the final video in a high-quality format suitable for web and social media use.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating high-quality promotional videos.
Strong portfolio demonstrating similar projects.
Ability to work with brand guidelines and provided assets.
Excellent communication skills and ability to meet deadlines.
Experience with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or equivalent.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating promotional content for the technology or education sectors.
Knowledge of compliance training and highly regulated industries.
Deliverables:

Storyboard and visual concept proposal.
30-second promotional video in MP4 format.
Source files of the project (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro project files).
Application Requirements:

A brief cover letter explaining your relevant experience and approach to this project.
Links to your portfolio or examples of similar work.
Estimated timeline for project completion.
Your proposed budget for the project.

Script Breakdown and Scene Instructions

[Opening Scene: 0-5 seconds]
• Visual: Fading in from black to a montage of the old Gyrus Systems logo, historical office scenes, and team members working.
• Text Overlay: "Since 1987, Gyrus Systems has led the way in learning management."
• Audio: Voiceover (Narrator): "Since 1987, Gyrus Systems has led the way in learning management."
[Transition: 5-10 seconds]
• Visual: The old logo morphing into the new logo.
• Text Overlay: "Today, we unveil our new look and renewed mission."
• Audio: Voiceover (Narrator): "Today, we unveil our new look and renewed mission."
[Middle Scene: 10-20 seconds]
• Visual: Showcasing the new logo, new website, and refreshed visual identity with vibrant colors and modern design.
• Text Overlay: "Our mission: ensuring critical organizations have prepared workforces."
• Audio: Voiceover (Narrator): "Our mission: ensuring critical organizations have prepared workforces."
• Visual: Professionals in regulated industries (e.g., healthcare, finance, manufacturing).
• Text Overlay: "Specializing in compliance training for regulated industries."
• Audio: Voiceover (Narrator): "Specializing in compliance training for regulated industries."
• Visual: Dynamic tech platform in action, highlighting ease of use and robust performance.
• Text Overlay: "With proven, easy-to-use technology."
• Audio: Voiceover (Narrator): "With proven, easy-to-use technology."
[Close-up Shots: 20-25 seconds]
• Visual: Close-ups of the team collaborating, customer interactions, and the new branding in action.
• Text Overlay: "And personalized LMS support."
• Audio: Voiceover (Narrator): "And personalized LMS support."
[Closing Scene: 25-30 seconds]
• Visual: The new logo displayed prominently with a tagline.
• Text Overlay: "Welcome to the new Gyrus Systems. Visit Gyrus.com."
• Audio: Voiceover (Narrator): "Welcome to the new Gyrus Systems. Visit Gyrus.com."

New Website: https://gyrus-us-staging.azurewebsites.net/ (Still in staging)
Current Website: https://www.gyrus.com (which is going to be OLD)

Included Old and New Logo

Please let us know if you have any questions.



Posted On: June 29, 2024 15:24 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: VFX / Compositing Birds for Short Film - Upwork
item.description:
Creating 8 Highly Realistic & Naturalistic VFX / Compositing Shots for a Passion Project Short Film about Mental Health

I have 8 short clips which require elements of VFX and compositing. The main task will be to incorporate existing footage of Starling Bird Murmurations into the scenes from footage I have shot for the short film. I presume this will mean isolating the birds from the sample clips, placing them within the tracked main footage, and creating movement and blending so the compositing of the birds into the short film scenes looks seamless and as naturalistic as possible. There is also one drone shot which required a sky replacement, as well as adding the birds.

The short film is a 10min passion project, created so far on zero budget with friends, but it explores complex themes relating to mental health, suicide and grief. I'd love to work with passionate and dedicated creatives to help take this project to the next level - and welcome people of all experience levels if you're confident about the task. Despite the small budget, I hope this can prove a useful addition to your reels, and also a worthwhile creative project for you to contribute meaningfully to. Incorporating the birds into the film will play a crucial role in elevating it into a more symbolic and magical space - where the birds in some ways represent hope and the spirit of someone who is no-longer present. So I thank you for your consideration and interest in advance for taking on this really important task for a film I feel truly passionately about.

I am attaching a confidential review link to the full short film (WIP) here for your reference. This includes timecoded notes for the individual moments of VFX I have included in the GDrive below:

https://vimeo.com/souvid/review/965585548/a099fbbcc9
password: starling

And I am attaching a GDrive link to the 8 shots I have in mind that require birds composited in. More details can be shared on exactly what movement and birds I would like featured in each shot. But for now I have also added some sample clips in the GDrive folder of Starling bird murmurations I like and that we may be in a position to reuse for the compositing.

GDrive Link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1VywlHZKDgydTrS4XCMExixmF3ekvp8D3?usp=sharing



Budget: $500
Posted On: June 29, 2024 15:18 UTC
Category: Visual Effects
Skills:Chroma Keying, Keying, Match Moving, Video Cleanup, Adobe After Effects, Visual Effects, Compositing, Rotoscoping, Maxon Cinema 4D, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Chroma Keying, Keying, Match Moving, Video Cleanup, Adobe After Effects, Visual Effects, Compositing, Rotoscoping, Maxon Cinema 4D, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
